title: How To Create a Callout Message Box

content.text: Learn how to create callout messages with CSS.
content.html: Learn how to create callout messages with CSS.

content.text: A callout message is often positioned at the bottom of a page to notify the user about something special: tips/tricks, discounts, action needed, other.
content.html: A callout message is often positioned at the bottom of a page to notify the user about something special: tips/tricks, discounts, action needed, other.

content.code:
Callout Header
  ×  
   

Some text...
content.code_html:
<div class="callout">
  <div class="callout-header">Callout Header</div>
  <span class="closebtn" onclick="this.parentElement.style.display='none';">×</span>
  <div class="callout-container">
    <p>Some text...</p>
  </div>
</div>

content.text: If you want the ability to close the callout message, add a <span> element with an onclick attribute that says "when you click on me, hide my parent element" - which is the container <div> (class="alert").
content.html: If you want the ability to close the callout message, add a <span> element with an onclick attribute that says "when you click on me, hide my parent element" - which is the container <div> (class="alert").

content.text: Tip: Use the HTML entity " × " to create the letter "x".
content.html: Tip: Use the HTML entity "×" to create the letter "x".

content.text: Style the callout box and the close button:
content.html: Style the callout box and the close button:

syntaxHighlighting.text:
/* Callout box 
    - fixed position at the bottom of the page */

position: fixed;  bottom: 35px;  
    right: 20px;  margin-left: 20px;  max-width: 300px;

syntax_highlighting.text:
/* Callout box 
    - fixed position at the bottom of the page */

position: fixed;  bottom: 35px;  
    right: 20px;  margin-left: 20px;  max-width: 300px;

content.code_html:
/* Callout box - fixed position at the bottom of the page */
.callout {
  position: fixed;
  bottom: 35px;
  right: 20px;
  margin-left: 20px;
  max-width: 300px;
}

/* Callout header */
.callout-header {
  padding: 25px 15px;
  background: #555;
  font-size: 30px;
  color: white;
}

/* Callout container/body */
.callout-container {
  padding: 15px;
  background-color: #ccc;
  color: black
}

/* Close button */
.closebtn {
  position: absolute;
  top: 5px;
  right: 15px;
  color: white;
  font-size: 30px;
  cursor: pointer;
}

/* Change color on mouse-over */
.closebtn:hover {
  color: lightgrey;
}

syntax_highlighting_data.text:
/* Callout box 
    - fixed position at the bottom of the page */

position: fixed;  bottom: 35px;  
    right: 20px;  margin-left: 20px;  max-width: 300px;

content.text: Tip: Also check out Alert Messages .
